channel.title: Weird Disconnections?
channel.description:
Well ok. I have some weird disconnections on my server.
It was running fine a few mins ago, and then I compiled after adding a shop and now my admin acc wont log on. So I made a newbie accound and that logged fine, but then DC'd
There are no errors or anything like that.
Any help?
Should I take away the NPC I put it?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 03, 2008, 08:27:24 PM[/size][hr]Nevermind! I just had to change the NPC - Must have been a bad NPC
